name: ENLIGHT (Project Hexagon)
description:
ENLIGHT is a 2 dimensional platformer where your goal is to stay away from the light.  Traverse through 2 stages and 29 unique levels with increasing difficulty and fun.

Now, a word from my development partner:

"oreo is the best art designer in the world" -definitely not oreo

(NOTE: Windows may say this is an unsafe file.  My development partners and I have ran it on our computers multiple times.  It is safe.)
